question: Who is the author of the book "Welcome to Nowhere"?
explanation: The book \"Welcome to Nowhere\" has been authored by acclaimed childrenâ€™s writer Elizabeth Laird. This is a book about war and its consequences. Through book, author tells the story of 12-year-old Omar, his parents and four siblings, all of who are caught in the crossfire as civil war rages over Syria. Laird references real-life events and gives you great characters, heartwarming moments and even occasional humour.
